description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Jockey Turner on Stromboli [1915 May 20] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from unverified data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards. Photograph shows jockey Clarence J.A. Turner (1893-1957) aboard "Stomboli," a horse owned by August Belmont Sr. Stromboli ran in the fourth race at Belmont Park racetrack on May 20, 1915. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.19152 Call Number: LC-B2- 3485-4
